title: Take a page from heroes of the storm
body: Here is something that may solve issues in ranked , make solo que solo que and flex que for duo and above.

replies.body: This so much. Solo should be just that, solo. It's the only way to ensure competitive integrity. It made sense to allow duos back when there was only one queue, but now we already have a queue for premades. There's no reason to allow duos in solo queue anymore.
whats funny is how many people are downvoting lol. lets see people elo boosting down voting becuase they will lose customers
